catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 492
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: pink cover; brightly colored images including a woman weaving at a loom; decorative print studies with flower blossoms; broken ice; animal tropes; patterns and designs with bats, rings, rabbits, blossoms, and geometric designs; also images of plants, leaves, flowers, and dragon motif
markings: square seal first page URC; round seal back page LLC; sticker back cover LLC
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Pictorial Designs for All Artisans (Banshoku zukō 万職図考), vol. 3
